H0.text: Mantle is the layer of Earth that is divided into plates.

H1.text: Crust is the layer of Earth that is divided into plates.

H2.text: Inner core is the layer of Earth that is divided into plates.

H3.text: Outer core is the layer of Earth that is divided into plates.

A4.text: The lithosphere exists as separate and distinct tectonic plates, which ride on the viscoelastic asthenosphere.

A5.text: Tectonic lithospheric plates consist of lithospheric mantle overlain by one or two types of crustal material: oceanic crust and continental crust.

A6.text: The mantle is divided into upper and lower mantle separated by a transition zone.

A7.text: The crust is divided into oceanic crust and continental crust.

A8.text: The lithosphere is subdivided horizontally into tectonic plates, which ride on the viscoelastic asthenosphere.
